EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
ANGOLA.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
VESSEL MAMOLINO IN 07-34.30S 012-06.09E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN,
PHONE: 272 1938 3300, MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA OR
CAPE TOWN RADIO, PHONE: 272 1551 2617,
